tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_aid (
  financial_aid_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  aid_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  received_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
)

CREATE TABLE scholarship_details (
  scholarship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  scholarship_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  eligibility_criteria TEXT,
  award_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  application_deadline DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_aid (
    aid_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    application_date DATE,
    approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE scholarships (
    scholarship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    scholarship_name TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    eligibility_criteria TEXT,
    deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE financial_aid (
  aid_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  date_issued DATE
)

CREATE TABLE scholarship_details (
  scholarship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scholarship_name VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL,
  eligibility_criteria TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE student_funding (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  total_funding DECIMAL,
  funding_type VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Student (
  student_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS financial_aid (
    aid_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    aid_type VARCHAR(50),
    date_received DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scholarships (
    scholarship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scholarship_name VARCHAR(100),
    eligibility_criteria TEXT,
    amount_awarded DECIMAL(10, 2),
    application_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_info (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS funding_history (
    student_id INT,
    fund_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount_received DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date_received DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS payment_history (
    student_id INT,
    payment_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date DATE
)
